channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Left’s Real Target In Its Latest Attack On Robert E. Lee Is America Itself
item.description: Those on the left who label Robert E. Lee a traitor and call for statues of him to be torn down have no interest in the historical facts or good faith...

item.title: You Can Say That Again
item.description: Embrace the latest lingo of the young, even if it seems silly.

item.title: Bret Stephens Is A Graceless, Classless Boob Who Needs To Learn Manners
item.description: Bret Stephens, a tacky classist who punches down, says Donald Trump has degraded the office by showing poor manners.

item.title: House GOP passes 'first step' health care bill, considers broader package in 2026
item.description: House Republicans passed a health care bill on Wednesday that could serve as a catalyst for a broader measure next year to expand choices beyond Obama...

item.title: North Korea stole a record amount of crypto—again: report estimates its hackers’ 2025 haul at $2 billion
item.description: The country has now pilfered about $7 billion in crypto all-time.

item.title: House passes bill to criminalize gender-affirming care for minors
item.description: The House passed a bill Wednesday that would criminalize gender-affirming care for minors, imposing penalties of up to 10 years in prisons for parents...

item.title: Trump Scores Major Court Win In Bid To Keep D.C.’s Streets Safe
item.description: In a major win for the Trump administration, a federal appellate court agreed on Wednesday that President Trump can deploy the National Guard to Washi...

item.title: Turning Point USA holds AmericaFest conference following Charlie Kirk assassination
item.description: The AmericaFest 2025 conference kicks off to honor Charlie Kirk's legacy, with JD Vance and Donald Trump Jr. among conservative leaders expected to sp...

item.title: Trump sends 'Warrior dividend' checks to service members
item.description: President Trump said military service members are receiving a patriotic chunk of change this holiday season thanks to revenue from his tariffs.

item.title: AI governance becomes a board mandate as operational reality lags
item.description: Fortune 500 companies are racing to formalize AI oversight.

item.title: Trump admin ramps up key border security move that is expected to run over 1,400 miles: 'Important tool'
item.description: New "Smart Wall" contracts will add primary and secondary border barriers plus waterborne obstacles, while CBP layers in hundreds of miles of detectio...

item.title: Judge orders Trump to stop reductions in force, rehire fired workers
item.description: A federal judge ordered the administration to quit moving ahead with reductions in force, saying Wednesday that the law President Trump signed to reop...

item.title: GOP seizes on Dem civil war as progressives jump into key 2026 Senate races: ‘They're in shambles’
item.description: Progressive Democrats enter competitive Senate primaries amid party divisions, with Rep. Jasmine Crockett's Texas campaign highlighting ideological ri...

item.title: The American voter is angry about one thing above all and Trump’s tariffs are in the crossfire, Goldman’s chief political economist says
item.description: Cost of living is the issue driving the midterms. Trump calls affordability a "hoax" when Democrats say it, but his tariff regime is showing cracks.

item.title: Trump admin announces $11B Taiwan arms sales deal
item.description: The U.S. announced a record $11 billion arms deal with Taiwan, surpassing previous sales as China warns of war risks in Taiwan Strait tensions.

item.title: U.K. startup CellVoyant debuts AI platform that could radically reduce the cost of cell-based therapies such as CAR-T immunotherapy for cancer
item.description: CellVoyant says its FateView platform can reduce the cost of producing viable cells for therapy by up to 80%

item.title: Killing Of Nigerian Christians Underscores Islam Is Incompatible With Safety And Freedom
item.description: Nigeria is the epicenter of the fight for jihadist control and the imposition of sharia law over all of Africa.

item.title: Want a job in AI-era tech? Forget prestigious degrees—tech leaders want to see your GitHub projects and internships
item.description: As entry-level tech hiring slows, one CEO warns avoiding AI skills would be like “taking crazy pills”—and says Gen Z must show real proof of ability.

item.title: Vivek Ramaswamy Is Wrong About American Identity And Wrong About America
item.description: A disembodied notion of American identity means that America is really nothing at all, and no one is really an American.

item.title: Dan Bongino replies to Kash Patel's praise following departure announcement: 'Honor of a lifetime'
item.description: Deputy FBI director thanked Kash Patel as the director offered praise in a post on Wednesday after Bongino's announcement that he plans to depart the ...

item.title: Trump declares America is on the brink of an economic boom: 'We just needed a new president'

item.title: A Wild West Christmas, Courtesy of Frederic Remington and Sid Richardson
item.description: Remington’s nocturnes are full of spiritual feeling. Plus, a visit to the Cowgirl Hall of Fame.

item.title: America Needs AI That Is Pro-Human
item.description: A strong national AI framework is essential. States can help ensure that AI deployment strengthens families, workers, and human agency.

item.title: Norman Podhoretz, R.I.P.
item.description: He fought zealously because the stakes were high.

item.title: Fact-Checking Trump’s Claim That Venezuela Stole Oil and Land from the U.S.
item.description: As is often the case, there is a kernel of a shade of truth in the president’s hyperbolic talk on social media.
